column5: A few weekends  back i had a chance to drive up north and meet up with an elderly lady i'd say now in here seventys and owner of this little peice of fishing heaven that was up for sale  . After spending the morning looking the hole package deal  over she was offering  and its suroundings i decided yes and bought it . Even comes with this old 16' tinny that still floats and with a motor that was serviced  and is ready to go . Iam really looking forward to having a get away spot to get away from it all on the weekends this year and do nothing but fish . I wont say where it is for now , or at least not until we are on our way up to fish the weekend ... lol.

Very nice Skip, looks like a nice place.  If it's allowed in that location and if you'd like a bit more room, it doesn't take much to add an addition like a Florida room to those trailers.  I had a couple trailers that I built additions to on a permanent site in the Kawarthas for 36 years and really enjoyed them.

I hear you Lew , and yes on the add a room would be a great thing . We've had the tow behinds and the motor homes in the past but i think the stand still Park model will be the best fun for us now ... lol
It's nice to have a getaway...a quiet place to go to to collect your thoughts. Congrats.
WTG Skip !!!! I smell "G2G" in the future   LOL. Congrats
Welcome to the trailerhood. What lake are you on?
Everyone needs their own slice if they have the means to do it. Congrats and enjoy.
Good for you skip.....  I agree.... GTG with the skipper... Lol
awesome !!! looks sweet,nice and quiet too...congrats skip
Way to go Skip - remember I got weekends off starting next month hint hint!  Michael

Thanks a lot for the comments fellows , a g2g would be awsome down the road for sure , just give me a bit of time to find the holes and we''l be good ... lol . " Where is it located "  for now if i leave it were it is i'l say ... i can either go up the Chute or down .... lol
That's not NORTH.  Nice area. My buddy has a cottage there.
Congrats skip,beauty getaway,boat, deck, Sounds like we could get there by boat!  .
You got it right DB ...... LOL . No its not north from where you are Nip , but it is quite a peice up from Toronto ... lol .
Congrats on trailer skip. And yet ANOTHER boat. LOL  A G2G would be great up at skippers, everyone gets their own boat to fish from.
